lines.text: Do you swap back the ones that are bad?
Bad? I don't vend bad peanuts, boy. Maybe a little underbred timewarn perhaps, but not really bad.
My name's not Sonny, it's Toby Tyler
You, my boy, could be... a concessionare.
Mr. Stubbs, have you see my shoes? Good night, I left them over at the lemonade stand.
I got my own horse back home.
Name's Old Red, he's not really old that's just his name,
You know, what gait does he favor most?
Oh, I guess he favers most the gate that leads down to the pasture. Lots of sweet clover down there.
I'm a poor man, yet I took you in out of decency's sake when no one else would have you!
